009package imagingbook.pdf;
010
011import java.awt.Desktop;
012import java.io.File;
013import java.io.FileOutputStream;
014
015import com.lowagie.text.Chunk;
016import com.lowagie.text.Document;
017import com.lowagie.text.Font;
018import com.lowagie.text.PageSize;
019import com.lowagie.text.Phrase;
020import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfWriter;
021
022import ij.IJ;
023
024/**
025 * Creates a 1-page PDF with samples of all 14 standard Type1 fonts embedded.
026 * 
027 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1775008/embed-font-into-pdf-file-by-using-itext
028 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2019607/how-to-embed-helvetica-font-in-pdf-using-itext?rq=1
029 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34328953/embedding-helvetica-neue-deskinterface-font-with-itext
030 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32457258/pdf-partial-font-embedding-with-itext
031 * 
032 * AWT/PDF fonts issue: 
033 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17667615/how-can-itext-embed-font-used-by-jfreechart-for-chart-title-and-labels?rq=1
034 * 
035 * 
036 * TODO: check if change to https://pdfbox.apache.org/ = https://github.com/apache/pdfbox
037 * @author WB
038 *
039 */
040public class Type1FontPdfDemo {
041        
042        static float fontSize = 14f;
043
044        public static void main(String[] args) {
045                
046//              File file = new File("D:/tmp/Type1FontDemo.pdf");
047                File file = new File(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir") + "/Type1FontDemo.pdf");
048        System.out.println("writting to " + file.getAbsolutePath());
049
050            // creation of the document with a certain size and certain margins
051            // may want to use PageSize.LETTER instead
052            Document document = new Document(PageSize.A4, 50, 50, 50, 50);
053            try {
054                FileOutputStream strm = new FileOutputStream(file);
055                PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.getInstance(document, strm);
056
057                document.open();
058                Phrase phrase = new Phrase();
059
060                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Courier.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
061                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
062                
063                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
064                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
065                
066                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-Oblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
067                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
068                
069                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-BoldOblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierBoldOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
070                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
071                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE); 
072
073                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Helvetica.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
074                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
075                
076                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.HelveticaBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
077                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
078                
079                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica-BoldOblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.HelveticaBoldOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
080                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
081                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
082                
083                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesRoman.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
084                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
085                
086                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
087                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
088
089                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-BoldItalic", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesBoldItalic.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
090                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);            
091
092                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-Italic", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesItalic.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
093                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
094                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
095
096                
097                phrase.add(new Chunk("Symbol", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Symbol.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
098                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE); 
099                
100                phrase.add(new Chunk("ZapfDingbats", new Font(Type1CoreFont.ZapfDingbats.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
101                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);  
102
103                document.add(phrase);
104
105                document.close();
106                writer.close();
107                strm.close();
108                System.out.println("file written to " + file.getAbsolutePath());
109                
110
111            } catch (Exception ex) {
112                System.err.println(ex.getMessage());
113            }
114            
115            // try to open the PDF:
116            Desktop dt = Desktop.getDesktop();
117                try {
118                        dt.open(file);
119                } catch (Exception ex) {
120                        IJ.error("Could not open PDF file " + file.getAbsolutePath());
121                }
122        }
123            
124}
